response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market rate, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to hearing your response soon.", "product_price": 12000}
